arm_group.description: amlodipine plus atorvastatin in a single tablet (Caduet, Pfizer, USA) was given once daily
amlodipine(Norvasc, Pfizer, USA) given once daily

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of this study is to test the hypothesis that amlodipine plus
      atorvastatin given in a single tablet (Caduet), compared with amlodipine alone (Norvasc),
      has a stronger effect in protection of arterial structure and function.

clinical_study.brief_title: Amlodipine Plus/Minus Atorvastatin for Protection of Arteries
clinical_study.official_title: Amlodipine Plus/Minus Atorvastatin for Protection of Arteries

authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration
